semantic_checks.name: Haptic: version year too small
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Invalid version, the year should be greater or equal to 2023.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Haptic: version amendement equals zero
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Invalid version, the amendment should be greater than 0.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Haptic: invalid profile
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Invalid profile, possible values are "Main" and "Simple Parametric".
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Haptic: invalid level
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Invalid level, possible values are 1 and 2.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Haptic: invalid date
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Invalid date, the date format shall conform to ISO 8601 series.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Haptic: invalid timescale
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Invalid timescale. The main profile only supports a value lower than or equal to 48000
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Avatar: duplicate id
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Invalid avatar id. Id 1 is not unique.
Invalid avatar id. Id 1 is not unique.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Avatar: uri invalid
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Invalid URI, the URI format shall conform to RFC3986.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Perception: id duplicate
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Invalid perception id. Id 0 is not unique.
Invalid perception id. Id 0 is not unique.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Perception: non supported perception modality
semantic_checks.expected_output:
The perception modality Other of perception 0 is not allowed for the level 1 of the Simple Parametric profile.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Perception: avatar id non existant
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Avatar id 1 of perception 0 does not exist.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Perception: too many channels
semantic_checks.expected_output:
The number of channels in perception 0 is too high. The level 1 only supports up to 128 channels.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Reference Device: id duplicate
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Invalid reference device id for perception 0.Id 1 is not unique.
Invalid reference device id for perception 0.Id 1 is not unique.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Reference Device: maximum_frequency less than minimum_frequency
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Invalid reference device 1 for perception 0. The maximum frequency is smaller than the minimum frequency
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Reference Device: resonance_frequency less than minimum_frequency
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Invalid reference device 1 for perception 0. The resonance frequency is smaller than the minimum frequency
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Reference Device: resonance_frequency greater_than_maximum_frequency
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Invalid reference device 1 for perception 0. The resonance frequency is greater than the maximum frequency
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Channel: id duplicate
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Invalid channel id for perception 0.Id 0 is not unique.
Invalid channel id for perception 0.Id 0 is not unique.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Channel: reference_device_id non_existent
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Reference device id 1 of channel 0 of perception 0 does not exist.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Channel: actuator_resolution negative
semantic_checks.expected_output:
The actuator resolution in channel 0 of perception 0 is invalid. It contains a negative value.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Channel: actuator_target out of resolution range
semantic_checks.expected_output:
One actuator target is out of the actuator resolution range in channel 0 of perception 0.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Channel: too many bands
semantic_checks.expected_output:
The number of bands in channel 0 of perception 0 is too high. The level 1 only supports up to 7 bands per channel.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Channel: direction non unit_vector
semantic_checks.expected_output:
The direction in channel 0 of perception 0 is not a unit vector.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Band: curve_type defined for WaveletWave band_type
semantic_checks.expected_output:
The curve type should only be specified for Curve Bands in channel 0 of perception 0.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Band: block_length not power of 2
semantic_checks.expected_output:
The block length of the wavelet band should be a power of two in channel 0 of perception 0.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Band: upper_frequency_limit less than lower_frequency_limit
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Invalid band in perception 0. The upper limit frequency is smaller than the lower limit frequency
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Effect: id duplicate
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Invalid library effect id for perception 0.Id 0 is not unique.
Invalid library effect id for perception 0.Id 0 is not unique.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Effect: id non existent
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Effect id 1 of band VectorialWave of channel 0 of perception 0 can't be found in the effect library.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Effect: effect_type not supported
semantic_checks.expected_output:
The Simple Parametric profile does not support Composite Effect in channel 0 of perception 0.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Effect: invalid sematic_keywords
semantic_checks.expected_output:
An effect in channel 0 of perception 0 uses invalid semantic keywords.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.

semantic_checks.name: Effect: wavelet effect contains keyframes
semantic_checks.expected_output:
Effects in wavelet bands sould not contain keyframes in channel 0 of perception 0.
The HJIF input file is not conformant to the specification.
